sourcesContent: import React, {useState} from 'react'; import { useForm, ValidationError } from '@formspree/react'; import ReCAPTCHA from 'react-google-recaptcha'; import { Transition } from '@headlessui/react' //components import Modal from './Modal'; function ContactForm() { const [state, handleSubmit] = useForm("xzbodker"); const [isShowing, setIsShowing] = useState(false); if (state.succeeded) { setTimeout(function () {window.location.reload();}, 7000); return ; } return (
